example.eg: Is your operating system up to date?
example.egtrans: 你的操作系统是最新的么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 现代的, 先进的, 最新的

example.eg: Jen was always up to date on her celebrity gossip.
example.egtrans: 对于名人的小道传闻珍总是消息灵通。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最新的, 随时更新的, 消息灵通的

example.eg: Alice brought me up to date with all her news.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 告诉...最新消息, 给...最新消息

example.eg: We'll keep you up to date with the latest business news.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…了解最新消息, 使…跟上时代

example.eg: It's important to keep your business website up to date.
I read Vogue magazine to keep up to date with all the latest fashions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 了解最新消息, 跟上时代
